name: Red Crystal Dragon Full Game
description:
Red Crystal Dragon

*Story* Season 1

Red Crystal Dragon is adventure/platform game that includes two best friends Tennita, the red crystal dragon warrior and Color, the prince of the Shinrin Kingdom. They must travel through planets to stop Color’s uncle Hodarou from taking over their father’s kingdom to become true king and rule all planets. Ghastly, Hodarou’s apprentice, also stole the Chaotix Scrolls and book call “Vile of Creativity” to help him gain maximum power. Tennita and Color must get a secret passes from each ruler to travel each home world to stop Ghastly faster and defeat Hodarou and his henchmen from taking over the universe. Tennita must also learn about her past of how does she become a red crystal dragon warrior and search for the rest of her family, the Red Crystal Dragon Champions.

*Gameplay*

To travel to each planet, step into the portal.

You can jump on platforms,attack enemies, enter mirror portals in levels

You can unlock doors by grabbing a key in level

*Controls*

A - LEFT

D - RIGHT

P - PAUSE

K - PRIMARY ATTACKS

M - Secondary Attack

Q- Quit the Game

R - Restart Level

ENTER - JUMP
